sentences.en: Aerobic dance is conductive to the health.
Aerobic exercise gets the heart pumping and helps you to burn up the fat.
sentences.cn: 有氧运动加速心脏跳动，有助于消耗更多脂肪。

sentences.en: Aerobic exercise helps to build up stamina.
sentences.cn: 有氧健身操有助于增强耐力.

sentences.en: Enjoy a great performance of the National University Aerobic athletes!
sentences.cn: 接下来观看国立大学健美操运动员带来的出色表演吧!

sentences.en: In aerobic conditions, laccases can be oxidized a variety of substrates.
sentences.cn: 在有氧条件下, 漆酶可氧化多种基质.

sentences.en: In aerobic systems, oxygen is the terminal electron acceptor and is reduced.
sentences.cn: 在需氧体系中, 氧是末端电子接受体并且被还原.

sentences.en: In contrast, aerobic exercise can reduce the concentration of triglyceride in blood.
sentences.cn: 相反, 运动可减低三酸甘油脂的浓度.

sentences.en: Many natural fibers decay rapidly when exposed to aerobic cultures.
sentences.cn: 许多天然纤维在需氧菌的侵袭下则迅速腐坏.

sentences.en: Most types of exercise can be either aerobic or anaerobic.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数运动即可以是有氧运动也可以是无氧运动.

sentences.en: Our data suggest that aerobic fitness is associated with longer telomeres.
sentences.cn: 根据我们的数据,有氧能力与端粒更长相关.

sentences.en: running, swimming, and other forms of aerobic exercise
sentences.cn: 跑步、游泳及其他有氧健身运动

sentences.en: Skipping is one of the most enjoyable aerobic activities.
sentences.cn: 跳绳是最有乐趣的有氧健身运动之一。

sentences.en: The best way to increase the metabolism is to do aerobic exercises.
sentences.cn: 促进新陈代谢的最好办法是做有氧运动.

sentences.en: The slime layer consists of one aerobic and one anaerobic sublayer.
sentences.cn: 粘膜层由好气分层和厌气分层所组成.

sentences.en: Third, achieving the goal of controlling weight finally by aerobic exercise.
sentences.cn: 三是通过有氧运动来改善,最终达到控制体重的目的.

sentences.en: Walking, done in the right way, is a form of aerobic exercise.
sentences.cn: 走路，如果方法正确的话，也是一种有氧健身运动。

words.tran_cn: [微] 需氧菌；[微] 需氧微生物
有氧运动法；增氧健身法
[微] 需氧生活；[微] 好氧生活
[生物][环境]需氧的；增氧健身法的

phrases.tran_cn: 需氧发酵；好气发酵；需气发酵
需氧代谢；有氧新陈代谢
需氧处理；耗氧处理；好气处理

trans.tran_cn: 需氧的，有氧的，有氧健身的，增氧健身法
